## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have run `black` and `isort` on my code
- [ ] I have run `flake8` and fixed any issues
- [ ] I have run `mypy` and addressed type hints (if applicable)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] My code has no security vulnerabilities

### Documentation

- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (README, docstrings, etc.)
- [ ] I have added/updated type hints
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG (if applicable)

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have not added new dependencies, or I have justified them
- [ ] I have updated `pyproject.toml` if dependencies changed
- [ ] I have updated `poetry.lock` if dependencies changed
